hero.title: Smarter business travel, from booking to book close
hero.subtitle: Book flights and hotels at the lowest rates, automatically enforce customizable travel policies, and automate expenses throughout a tripâ€”all from one platform.

policy.title: CUSTOM TRAVEL POLICIES, BUILT RIGHT IN
policy.subtitle: Keep expenses in check as your business expands
policy.controlsDescription: Customize guardrails to prevent out-of-policy spend, from per-diems to hotel rates. Lavas Labs can also create flexible controls based on market rate

oversee.title: OVERSEE TRAVEL SPEND AS IT HAPPENS
oversee.subtitle: Close the books without delays

business.title: EFFORTLESS BUSINESS TRAVEL THAT'S ALWAYS IN POLICY
business.subtitle: Designed to make saving easier.

control.description1: Customize guardrails to prevent out-of-policy spend, from per-diems to hotel rates. Lavas Labs can also create flexible controls based on market rate
control.description2: Opt to split savings with employees that book more cost-effective options.

expense.title: Focus on your trip, not expense reports
expense.description: Lavas Labs collects and matches receipts across all transactions, and routes to the right budget and category. It instantly generates receipts for certain purchases, and saves recurring memos.
expense.automatedDescription: Automatically capture and categorize travel expenses with smart receipt matching and approval workflows.
expense.trackingDescription: Monitor and track all travel expenses in real-time with detailed reporting and analytics capabilities.
